questions.question: Confirm the equipment with below provided image of the equipment.
upload the image of the equipment, contact the technical team for recorrections and scan the bar code again
confirm is there any physical damage of the equipment.
prepare the Damage / Incident and Missing Report
connect the equipment to the mains and check whether the equipment is getting ON.
check and confirm whether the wall outlet is provided with AC Voltage of 230
shift the equipment to another place where wall outlet is provided with AC Voltage of 230
check the continuity of power cord and confirm whether the power cord is defective.
replace the power cord with a new one
check and confirm whether there is any breakage or damage of power pin connector.
replace the power pin connector with a new one
open the equipment as shown in the video, check whether the output voltage is available at the control board.

videos.videoName: checking O/P volt. Of control board

questions.question: repair/replace the control board accordingly
check and confirm whether the equipment is getting ON, but the blower is not working.
open the equipment as shown in the video, check whether the voltage is available at the blower connector.
check and confirm for any loose connection / breakage of cable from blower to control board.
reseat / replace the cable with a new one
repair/ replace the control board accordingly
repair/ replace the blower accordingly
check and confirm whether there is sufficient amount of BIPAP output is available.
open the equipment as shown in the video, check whether the filter is filled with dirt or dust.
clean the filter and replace them back properly
If the problem is not yet solved, contact the technical team for any other assistance through video call.
Thanks
